name: Metal Fire: Action 2D Shooter Game
description:
Become a soldier on an extraordinary war mission. Metal Fire is a 2D Shooter game with an attractive retro Side-Scroller style. This is a very exciting 2D shooter action adventure game.

With many challenging missions. Use a variety of weapons, grenades, and even knives to deal with enemies. Defeat enemies, tanks, helicopters and drones in very challenging battles.

Become a hero who saves the world from the evil corupt Governator. Run 'n Gun game with many challenging missions. Find lots of weapons such as rockets, lasers, machine guns and more.
